name: worldview
description:
note, the web build is bad; i really recommend playing a downloadable version. warning, flickering and flashing lights.

worldview

you are a sensory being. see and hear the world around you.

made in a week for the class "prototype studio" at the nyu game center. the theme was "your worst nightmare". i don't think this is my worst nightmare, i didn't really follow the brief. but maybe it's yours.

controls
- w/s, stick (left): move
- i/k, stick (right): look
- ctrl+r: reset
